title: 07/19/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 07/19/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin ponders the question that if Giannis leads the Milwaukee Bucks to a NBA Championship tomorrow night, are we seeing the beginning of a new dynasty in the East? Nick Wright made an extremely accurate statement about free throws being overrated and volume shines for a reason in every aspect of life. With the release of Space Jam 2, its already turned into Jordan VS LeBron again but we all know there is no competition between the two. Plus, another riveting edition of: "Where Colin was Right & Wrong!"


Guest: Cedric Ceballos

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
